caption.p: The kinetics of unwinding of the AT-rich hairpin in the S5 oligonucleotide by helicase UL9 in the absence (A) and presence (B) of Pt-bis-netropsin. I 0 – fluorescence intensity of free S5 at 559 nm. Excitation wavelength – 510 nm; excitation and emission slit widths – 10 and 5 nm, respectively. Additions of OBP, Pt-bis-Nt and ATP to the oligonucleotide solution are indicated by arrows. Concentrations: ATP – 1.8 × 10 −2 M, S5 – 1.1 × 10 −7 M, UL9 helicase – 3.9 × 10 −7 M, Pt-bis-Nt – 2.9 × 10 −7 M. Incubation conditions: 20 mM Tris-HCl (pH 7.2), 4 mM MgCl 2, .18 M NaCl, 10% glycerol, .01% Triton X-100, 1 mM dithiothreitol, 37 °C. Panel C, the kinetics of unwinding of the AT-rich hairpin in the oligonucleotide S5 measured at 33 °C in the absence of Pt-bis-Nt.
